  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vogella.jersey.todo.resources.TodoResource

  • public class TodoResource
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TodoResource(javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo, javax.ws.rs.core.Request request, java.lang.String id) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteTodo()
      Deletes the message with the stated id if it does not exist, it throws a runTime exception.
      com.vogella.jersey.todo.model.Todo getTodo()
      Used to get a single Message as Application XML Searches the messages (TodoDao) Hashmap to obtain the message with the requested id.
      com.vogella.jersey.todo.model.Todo getTodoHTML()
      Used to get a single Message as Text XML Searches the messages (TodoDao) Hashmap to obtain the message with the requested id and display it in a format that is readable by the user if it cannot find the message then it throws a Runtime Exception and a message saying that the requested message does not exist.
      com.vogella.jersey.todo.model.Todo getTodoo()
      Used to get a single Message as Application JSON Searches the messages (TodoDao) Hashmap to obtain the message with the requested id.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response putTodo(javax.xml.bind.JAXBElement<com.vogella.jersey.todo.model.Todo> todo)
      Used to update an already existing message.

    • Method Detail

      • getTodo

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/xml")
public com.vogella.jersey.todo.model.Todo getTodo()
        Used to get a single Message as Application XML Searches the messages (TodoDao) Hashmap to obtain the message with the requested id. if it cannot find the hashmap member then it throws a Runtime Exception and a message saying that the requested message does not exist.
        Returns:
        message (todo)

      • getTodoo

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public com.vogella.jersey.todo.model.Todo getTodoo()
        Used to get a single Message as Application JSON Searches the messages (TodoDao) Hashmap to obtain the message with the requested id. if it cannot find the message then it throws a Runtime Exception and a message saying that the requested message does not exist.
        Returns:
        message (todo)

      • getTodoHTML

        @GET
 @Produces(value="text/xml")
public com.vogella.jersey.todo.model.Todo getTodoHTML()
        Used to get a single Message as Text XML Searches the messages (TodoDao) Hashmap to obtain the message with the requested id and display it in a format that is readable by the user if it cannot find the message then it throws a Runtime Exception and a message saying that the requested message does not exist.
        Returns:
        message (todo)

      • putTodo

        @PUT
 @Consumes(value="application/xml")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response putTodo(javax.xml.bind.JAXBElement<com.vogella.jersey.todo.model.Todo> todo)
        Used to update an already existing message. Consumes an XML object that replaces an existing message Uses the putAndGetResponse method to check if the resource has been updated or not.
        Parameters:
        todo -
        Returns:
        Response

      • deleteTodo

        @DELETE
public void deleteTodo()
        Deletes the message with the stated id if it does not exist, it throws a runTime exception.
